title: "R100fitting"
author: "Yunfeng Yang"
date: "2/21/2022"
output: html_document
---
```{r}
bending <- read.csv("bending-pl.csv", header = T)
# convert psi to Mpa
#  1 thousand psi = 6.895 MPa
bending[,1] <- bending[,1]/1000*6.895


R100_data <- bending[bending[,2] == "R100",1]
R20_data <- bending[bending[,2] == "R20",1]
R20R100_data <- bending[bending[,2] == "R20R100",1]
```



```{r}
hist(R100_data)
hist(sqrt(R100_data))
hist(log(R100_data))

shapiro.test(R100_data)
shapiro.test(sqrt(R100_data))
shapiro.test(log((R100_data)))
```


All pvalues < 0.05, indicate that normal is not a good fitting.
